location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: ‘Proposed Reservation for Refinery, Water Wells and Lines to Sitra. SK. No. 120’

physicalDescription.extent: Dimensions:250 x 500 mm, on sheet 275 x 510 mm

mods.abstract: Distinctive Features:Blueprint sketch map dated 3 January 1936 produced by the Bahrein Petroleum Company, depicting the proposed reservation of land for the refinery at Sitrah, Bahrain. Enclosed with a letter no. PA-349 (folio 47).Shows the 300 acres designated for the refinery site and indicates the location of the triangulation station, four water wells reservation, the 80 feet wide strip of land, and the Sitra Terminal. Coordinates and measurements reported.
